p:
One microgram of purified RNA was used as starting material for qRT-PCR assay. cDNA synthesis was performed according to Agilent High Specificity 1st strand cDNA synthesis protocol. The assay was performed in Stratagene Mx3005P using Eva Green relative quantification (BioRad) according to manufacturer’s protocol. Data calculation was done using Delta Ct method
31 .
